data.Name: Lil Peep
data.Bio: Lil Peep (born Gustav Ã…hr) was an American recording artist hailing from Long Island, New York. He was cited as one of the primary artists responsible for the post-emo revival with his style of hip hop which came to be known as emo trap. After a slight delay, his debut album Come over When You're Sober, Pt. 1 was released on August 15, 2017. Due to a possible drug overdose, he passed away on November 15, 2017 (aged 21). Lil Peep was described as a "SoundCloud rapper", and his musical style is considered lo-fi rap or emo-trap. Read more on Last.fm
